item.title: Blueprint Listening Post – Wed 15 Oct, 11:00–11:30
item.description: Drop-in Q&A at Level 3 Breakout Space. Ask your Blueprint questions and hear from the project leads.

item.title: West Gate Bridge Memorial – Wed 15 Oct
item.description: Executive attending 55th Annual West Gate Bridge Memorial at Douglas Parade, Spotswood, honouring 35 workers lost in 1970.

item.title: Bathurst 1000 Win – Peter Brock Trophy Returns
item.description: Matt Payne and Garth Tander delivered Ford its first Bathurst 1000 win in years.

item.title: Future State Blueprint Listening Post – Wed 11:00–11:30
item.description: Drop-in Q&A at Level 3 Breakout Space. Join Tessa, Sophie and Cam to ask questions or listen in.

item.title: Take Advantage of Collaborative Spaces
item.description: Staff are encouraged to use our shared collaboration areas for teamwork. Read the new guide to make the most of our available spaces.

item.title: Tax Returns Due – FY25 Reminder
item.description: Reminder: if you’re submitting your own tax return, it’s due by 31 Oct. Don’t miss the deadline.

item.title: Welcome to New Starters
item.description: Welcome to Senan O’Muirí, Christina Walls, and Cath Hinton who join LeavePlus this week across Service Investigations and Stakeholder Engagement.

item.title: Farewells – Danny & Aneta
item.description: Danny D’Alessandro and Aneta Nikoloski finish with us soon. We thank them both for their time and contributions.

item.title: Staff Movement – Steph Gilbert
item.description: Steph Gilbert has moved from Member Benefits to Approver in Operations Support as of 6 Oct. Congrats Steph!

item.title: Table Tennis Tournament – Wed 12:30
item.description: Final match this Wed 12:30pm. Get ready to cheer! Winners: Shantiks VS EOs and KAOS VS Service & Destroy. Grand Final next Wed 29 Oct.

item.title: Trivia & Christmas Party – RSVP Reminder
item.description: Reminder to RSVP for Trivia & Christmas Party events so we can cater accordingly. Don’t miss out!

item.title: EOI – Acknowledgement of Country Presenters
item.description: Interested in presenting the Acknowledgement of Country at a Town Hall? Sign up via the EOI link provided in the update.

item.title: Security Passes – Lost or Returned
item.description: If you’ve lost or returned your security pass, contact Reception for assistance. Please report missing passes promptly.

item.title: Wellness Tip – Rest and Recovery
item.description: Rest isn’t a reward; it’s a necessity. Take time to recharge and allow yourself guilt-free rest for better energy and focus.

item.title: Career Opportunities – Internal Careers Page
item.description: Looking for a new role? Visit the Internal Careers Page via ELMA to explore current vacancies at LeavePlus.

item.title: LOVE Award Nominations – Open Now
item.description: Nominate a colleague living our values for a LeavePlus LOVE Award. Submit your nomination online today.
